mean_en: a narrow area of high land along the top of a line of hills; a high pointed area near the top of a mountain; a raised line on the surface of something; the point where two sloping surfaces join; a long narrow area of high pressure in the atmosphere
sentence: He\u0027s on the very top of the peak on the far side of that ridge.
sentence_trans: 他在山脊另一边的山顶上。
